Message.Title: No AMZN hype PR's prior to this Q's Earnings call like prior Q's? Is AMZN becoming Humble?
Message.Msg: What, no PR's stacking products to the Moon? how about Mars? Last Q, what shot up the stock on an un-real $31 run prior to Earnings was the January 2nd announcement: "Amazon Marketplace Sellers Enjoy High Growth Holiday Season" which led to a $6 day, and we had to read (on what turned out to be a bad Q on disappointing revenue and guidance): • Amazon’s third-party sellers sold enough Santa Hats for Santa to be able to wear a new hat every day for the next 137 years. • Amazon’s third-party sellers sold enough smartphone and tablet screen protectors to cover the field of every NFL stadium, four times over. • Amazon’s third-party sellers sold enough guitar picks to give one to every attendee of Woodstock. • Amazon’s third-party sellers sold enough mustache pacifiers to give one to every baby born in Washington State next month. • Amazon’s third-party sellers sold enough tea lights to keep a votive illuminated continuously for over 200 years.

Topic.Title: This pig continuez to wallo in the mud on yet another bubble breaking day in a market blowoff

Message.Msg: Nonsense--you and your charts. You talk as if you are the only one who has shorted a stock and made money, and that this is your "club." "Charts" are made by the people who run the bid-ask, the institutions. They alone have the money to bid up and dump down stock prices. They do it arbitrarily, not based upon what today's or yesterday's "chart" looks like---after all, THEY are the one's who made the chart look as it does! It didn't happen by itself. And if you are publicly claiming that they do in hopes of somehow "causing" the stock price to be influenced to go down, you are a charlatan. It goes "up" and "down" ONLY because of the whims in the minds of the funds running the bid-ask, PERIOD. No amount of your "voo doo" interpretations and talk is going to change that fact. And neither is your name calling and labels. And neither is your deliberate misspelling of words.

Topic.Title: Another sham term that Sybs uses is "swing trade."

Message.Msg: Yes. Sybs would be happy to explain a swing trade.... Swing trading involvez trading around a core position az optimal targets are hit... Swing trading iz not to be confused with "day trading". Swing trading can last for weeks and months.... for example: Sybil shorted ksu over 6 weeks to avg 106 a share... Sybil covered 30% of a core short position at 101 2 dayz ago and haz opened up 60% of the covered position az of yesterday.... Another example: Sybil originally shorted amzn north of 245 in aug of last year. Since then sybs haz covered 30% at 205, reopened them at 240, covered them again at 220, and finished reopening them at 265. In addition to the core + swing trade position, sybil added amzn shorts in increments from 265 - 283.... This allowz sybs to hold amzn short at an avg of 265, instead of 245. From here sybs can sit comfy short and subtract the rips while patiently waiting for a good swing trade dip. Swing trading iz a slow methodical and disciplined approach to strengthening a position and maximizing gainz az apposed to an "all in" and "all out" approach to "timing" the markets, or worse - using crackhead optionz.

All while the fiat bitcoin markets have risen to the moon... In 2013, 2014, 2015 here'z sybs compounding targets az a short trader: 15% in 2013 az the market completes its topping process (15 % iz alwaz sybs target) 35-50% gainz in 2014 az the market crash gets well under way And 50-65 % in 2015 az the hacks that created this bubble realize that there'z nothing they can do to prevent a fall worse than 2008-2009 2016 - 30% off a nice run in the markets off an s&p 450-575 bottom... 2017 - 15%-30% : again on the long side and in silver 2018 - 15-20% on a roll over from s&p 1100 back down to 800... 2019-2021 - barely anything az the markets will be hated, restructured, and will hardly move 2021 - 2035: 15-25% / year on the long side secular bull market that awaits az the irresponsible boomerz die off and the unsustainable debt default iz fully resolved to prepare for real growth and a secular bull run similar to 1983-2000.... Sybs iz fully confident that it willplay out like this .... Why? Because thats what the charts say..... Will sybs "time" with a nonsense big bet - no.

Message.Title: 289 to 255 was a good ride down, now letting it bubble up
Message.Msg: the next question is: where will these hyper-bubblers take it next in this ER cycle: 280, 289 again, or 320 or 325? Then it will be once again nicely-elevated, to enjoy the slide-down the slope. Any comments from other sideline-watchers? The safe and more enjoyable rides here are none-the-less on the down side now; to climb-up, you have to hold your nose!
